DOC.brief_summary: We aimed to risk faoctors for GERD and association between visceral obesity, plasma adipoline(leptin, adiponectin, IL-6, TNF-Î±)and development of reflux esophagitis in healthy Koreans.
DOC.brief_title: Adipokines and the Risk of Reflux Esophagitis
DOC.criteria: endoscopically proven reflux esophagitis those with esophageal hiatal hernia, current PPI medication, upper GI operation history
